# Contact

## Reporting bugs

To report bugs please send a simple e-mail to the package maintainer:  
<Achim.Zeileis@R-project.org>

For inquiries you can also reach out on social media:  
[@zeileis@fosstodon.org](https://fosstodon.org/@zeileis) (Mastodon)  
[@AchimZeileis](https://x.com/AchimZeileis) (X/Twitter)

For discussions we also try to follow these channels:

* [CrossValidated](https://stats.StackExchange.com/questions/tagged/tobit-regression) with `tobit-regression` tag
* [R-help](https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/R-help) mailing list
